title: Your shop?
body:
Um, excuse me. Rito? My Shop still has a spinning circle for the past 100 years. Is "My Shop" really  ready for this client yet?
#RespawnLegacy

replies.body:
Hiya AkumaTamiie001 - 

There were several complications with Your Shop yesterday. Everything should be back to normal now, but if you're still seeing issues, please feel free to let me know!
where is the my shop at anyways? :|
I second this! I have a spinning shop as well with really good Internet.
I got to open the shop once then it was reduced to a circle. smh
